Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Was more personal. GenAI gave me exactly what I needed, a teacher often would give and indirect answer or would just blatantly not help at all.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback was easy to take on, it was real, evident and clear. Teacher feedback is often critical, misleading and sometimes judgmental. Not a good feeling.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI will tell you exactly what to improve, where to improve it, and how. A teacher will give you generalised advice that theyâ€™ve given 20 other students, if they even can.
